text: Even though we didnâ€™t attend the ceremony, I could feel the excitement for all the students who performed on stage. Cheers to all the teachers at DGP! Great work!

The teachers are loving and patient and the environment is great. Mrs Teng is a wonderful principal who takes time to address issues and ensures that the children are well taken care of. Great childcare to send children to, the curriculum is also good.

This is a very caring loving pre-school. Many teachers are senior teachers. The classrooms are very spacious. The school hold morning assembly in a large and high ceiling hall, with music and movement. Very frequently, the teachers take turn to play piano while leading the singing during assembly. I think this is excellent start of the day for all children. My children behaviour improved after we changed to this school.

I have no regret putting my children to this team of teachers in this good environment.
